name: FigJam Kanban Board
description:
A Kanban board is an interactive tool that can be used individually or collaboratively to help with task management. To use this template, create color-coded sticky notes labeled with your tasks, then move them to the appropriate column accordingly. 


Additionally, weâ€™ve included a Design Process Flow which is aimed to help you (or your team) visualize your process in a more detailed visual. Similar to a board game, move the shape with your labeled task along the pathway. 


This template was designed at WillowTree. Feel free to duplicate this file to use for your team (or just for yourself)!
